steps: step 2: Click on link 'Apple' -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
step 7: Click on link '1' -> Navigate to page 'cart'
step 8: Click on button 'Proceed to checkout' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/shipping-address'
step 9: Click on button 'Contact Info' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
step 11: Enter input value in input field 'email'
step 12: Click on button 'CONTINUE TO SHIPPING'
